titles.title: 1099K Elimination Act of 2023
1099K Elimination Act of 2023
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to remove a requirement for payment settlement entities to file returns relating to certain participating payees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1099K Elimination Act of 2023
This bill repeals the requirement of filing informational returns relating to payments made in settlement of payment card and third party network transactions.
